00016    struct xycoord {
00017       union {
00018          double x;         
00019          double xi;        
00020          double a;         
00021       };
00022       union {
00023          double y;         
00024          double eta;       
00025          double b;         
00026       };
00027 
00029       xycoord(
00030          double xval,
00031          double yval
00032       ) : x(xval), y(yval) {};
00033 
00035       xycoord() : x(0.0), y(0.0) {};
00036 
00038       xycoord operator-(
00039          const xycoord& op
00040       ) const {
00041          return xycoord(x - op.x, y - op.y);
00042       };
00043 
00045       xycoord operator+(
00046          const xycoord& op
00047       ) const {
00048          return xycoord(x + op.x, y + op.y);
00049       };
00050 
00052       xycoord operator*(
00053          const double& op
00054       ) const {
00055          return xycoord(x * op, y * op);
00056       };
00057 
00059       double len() const {
00060          return sqrt( x * x + y * y );
00061       }
00062 
00064       double len2() const {
00065          return x * x + y * y;
00066       }
00067    };
00068

00085    typedef xycoord instrcoord;

00097    struct spherical {
00098       double a;
00099       double b;
00100 
00102       spherical(
00103          double aval,         
00104          double bval          
00105       ) : a(aval), b(bval) {};
00106 
00108       spherical() : a(0.0), b(0.0) {};
00109 
00110       spherical( const vector& rhs);
00111    };

00119    struct deltav {
00120       public:
00121          double dx;
00122          double dy;
00123          double dz;
00124 
00126       deltav() : dx(0.0), dy(0.0), dz(0.0) {};
00127 
00129       deltav(
00130          const double x,
00131          const double y,
00132          const double z
00133       ) : dx(x), dy(y), dz(z) {};
00134 
00136       double len() const {
00137          return sqrt( dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz );
00138       }
00139 
00141       deltav operator*(
00142          const double& rhs
00143       ) const {
00144          return deltav(dx * rhs, dy * rhs, dz * rhs);
00145       };
00146 
00148       deltav operator/(
00149          const double& rhs
00150       ) const {
00151          return deltav(dx / rhs, dy / rhs, dz / rhs);
00152       };
00153 
00155       deltav operator+(
00156          const deltav& rhs
00157       ) const {
00158          return deltav(dx + rhs.dx, dy + rhs.dy, dz + rhs.dz);
00159       };
00160 
00162       deltav operator-(
00163          const deltav& rhs
00164       ) const {
00165          return deltav(dx - rhs.dx, dy - rhs.dy, dz - rhs.dz);
00166       };
00167    };
00168 
00170 
00181    struct vector {
00182       double x;
00183       double y;
00184       double z;
00185 
00187       vector(
00188          const double xval,
00189          const double yval,
00190          const double zval
00191       );
00192 
00194       vector(
00195          const double a,
00196          const double b
00197       );
00198 
00200       vector() : x(1.0), y(0.0), z(0.0) {};
00201 
00203       vector( const spherical& rhs);
00204 
00206       deltav operator-(
00207          const vector& rhs
00208       ) const {
00209          return deltav(x - rhs.x, y - rhs.y, z - rhs.z);
00210       };
00211 
00212    // Displacement
00213       vector operator+(
00214          const deltav& rhs
00215       ) const;
00216 
00217    // Inverse Displacement
00218       vector operator-(
00219          const deltav& rhs
00220       ) const {
00221          return *this + (rhs * -1.0);
00222       };
00223 
00224    // Offsets in the tangent plane
00225       vector operator+(
00226          const xycoord& rhs
00227       ) const;
00228 
00230       vector operator-(
00231          const xycoord& rhs
00232       ) const {
00233          return *this + (rhs * -1.0);
00234       };
00235 
00236    // Bearing of one vector relative to another
00237       double bearing(
00238          const vector& v
00239          ) const;
00240    };
